name: Marco Anderson
description: I am a very open, honest, loyal, committed, intelligent, passionate, friendly, down to earth person. I love to travel and meet all kinds of new people. I have a good sense of humor, fun to be around, and love great conversation. I have a great smile and have been told that it can light up a room. I absolutely love to kiss and could probably spend half my time doing it . I consider myself easy going and get along with just about everyone I meet. Romancing me goes a long way to winning me over! I can be spontaneous but also like to make plans and follow through with them. I am extremely thoughtful especially to those I care about.
